Package MODEL

Class GameView

java.lang.Object
MODEL.GameView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameView extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents the current view of the game.
See Also:

      ind - A fictive parameter to distinguish this constructor from the others.
